rawIndexableTextContent: A Tick is a visual representation of a point along an axis.  Overview When created based on a range, a tick includes a location along a single direction and a textual representation. It is meant to be created using a Scale, with some input domain being mapped to visualization using the Scale’s output range.
summary: A Tick is a visual representation of a point along an axis.
title: Tick
